full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYA BAS KHRUS SDIG LTUNG MUN SEL SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYA BAS KHRUS SDIG LTUNG MUN SEL SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THO YON BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DPAL SNAR THANG PA DANG, DGE BSHES 'CHANG KHANG PA GNYIS KYIS MDZAD PA'I RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS LAS GZHI BYAS TE, LHA'I BTZUN PA SKU SKYES BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYAL MTSAN GYI SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYAL MTSAN,
